operations.target_text: Guest Network Access: Visitors to the Company can access guest networks by registering with the office personnel, bypassing the need for a formal access request.
operations.comment: You indicated that you have an office, so guest network access section should be maintained. Having an office requires controlled network access for visitors to maintain security.
You indicated you use GitLab for version control, so this section should be maintained. Using version control requires proper source code access controls to protect intellectual property.

operations.target_text: Password management systems should be user-friendly
operations.replacement: Password management systems, specifically LastPass, should be user-friendly
operations.comment: You indicated you use LastPass for password management, so the policy should reference the actual system rather than using generic language.

operations.target_text: All requests will be sent by email to <email>
operations.replacement: All requests will be submitted through Zendesk ticketing system
operations.comment: You indicated you use Zendesk for ticketing and prefer using a ticketing system for access requests. Ticketing systems provide proper audit trails and tracking compared to email-based requests.

You selected semi-annual reviews instead of quarterly basis. For a small company of 2 employees, semi-annual reviews are appropriate. We recommend quarterly reviews for most companies, but smaller organizations can effectively manage with less frequent reviews.

You selected immediate termination of access. For a small company of 2 employees, immediate termination is feasible and provides the strongest security. This timeframe is appropriate for your organization size.
You indicated that Hassan Tayyab is the owner of this access control policy. This person will be responsible for enforcing the policy and answering any questions from employees.
You indicated that the Security Team is responsible for approving exceptions to this policy. This role is appropriate and can be the same as the violations reporting authority.
You indicated that the Security Team is responsible for handling policy violations. This role is appropriate and can be the same as the exceptions approval authority.
